# Import Required Libraries

```{r}
packages = c('tidyverse', 'httr', 'jsonlite')
for (p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
    }
  library(p,character.only = T)
}
```

# Import Aspatial Data from Folder

```{r}
filename = "data/aspatial/acra-information-on-corporate-entities-a.csv"
business_csv <- read_csv(filename, na = c("na")) %>%
  select("uen",
         "uen_issue_date",
         "entity_name",
         "primary_ssic_code",
         "postal_code",
         "entity_status_description")
glimpse(business_csv)
```

```{r}
na_records <- business_csv[rowSums(is.na(business_csv)) > 0, ]
na_records
```
